dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.usage.spec.UsageSpecification
dataStructure.description:
A detailed description of a usage event that are of billing system's interest and can have charges applied to it. It is comprised of characteristics, which define all attributes known for a particular type of usage.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: UsageSpecification

child.name: name
child.description:
The name of the usage specification.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:
A narrative that explains in detail what the product specification is.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: description

child.name: lifecycleStatus
child.description:
The condition of the usage specification, such as active, inactive, planned.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: lifecycleStatus

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the usage specification is valid.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor

child.name: usageSpecCharacteristic
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association UsageSpecCharUse

This association end is optional
child.label: usageSpecCharacteristic

child.name: usage
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association UsageSpecDescribes

This association end is optional
child.label: usage

child.name: usageSpecVersion
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association UsageSpecModificationsRecordedAs

This association end is optional
child.label: usageSpecVersion
